description: The trail starts gradually and gets noticeably steeper when reaching above tree line. The views are spectacular and the vegetation is plentiful. A small stream running down the trail in various areas, makes for beautiful scenery and a handy place to fill up for water.
directions: From Jefferson Notch Road, turn into Base Road leading to the Cog Railway up Mt. Washington. Park and start hiking up Ammonoosuc.
title: Ammonoosuc - Mt. Monroe
